article: One day Wang Ping's class  had  an English test. The teacher marked the students' papers and then gave them back to the students. Wang Ping looked at her paper. She  _  her marks : It was 85. Class was over. The students all  _  out and played on the ground,  _  Wang Ping still sat there. She didn't leave, but  did  the exercise again(,),  _  she gave her paper to the teacher. This time she got the exercises right. One of her classmates  _  her, "Why did you do the exercise again? You won't get  any  mark for that." Wang Ping answered  _  a smile . "I don't study  _  marks only."
